review: Simple, eloquent, and just works. Love that my kids can now use the old iPad to pick out the show they want to watch on their own without having to find the right remote and channel. Once they push play on the device it will switch inputs and start playing.
author: Sean Murphy "murfmiser"

review: It was super easy to connect and we found that if what you're wanting to watch what is on the device, like netflix or youtube it works great! It's fun to use your phone or laptop to control what you're watching. However, the reason we bought it is to watch shows on xfinity that are only online, so we had to watch the webpage instead of a program that was on the device. The connection was always running a smidge behind, so the words didn't match what the people were saying and it drove us crazy and we gave up!It's still pretty neat little toy for a great price.
author: Carrie

review: I purchased this just to watch Netflix on my TV but I have really loved Pandora. I wish I could watch Amazon Prime as well but Netflix keeps me busy!
